TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ManagementConfigurationAttribute extends System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementMemberAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class ManagementConfigurationAttribute Inherits ManagementMemberAttribute

Docs.summary: The ManagementConfiguration attribute indicates that a property or field represents a read-write WMI property. Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries. The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. This is the default constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Management::Instrumentation::ManagementConfigurationType Mode { System::Management::Instrumentation::ManagementConfigurationType get(); void set(System::Management::Instrumentation::ManagementConfigurationType value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the mode of the property, which specifies whether changes to it are applied as soon as possible or when a commit method is called.
Docs.value: 반환 된 WMI 속성을 사용할지 여부를 나타내는 또는 모드입니다.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 사용 하는 모든 읽기 / 쓰기 WMI 속성을 업데이트 해야이 정의 된 커밋 메서드인 경우는 <xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementConfigurationType.OnCommit> 모드입니다. 으로 식별 되는 <xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementCommitAttribute>합니다.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Type ^ Schema { Type ^ get(); void set(Type ^ value); };
member this.Schema : Type with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that defines the type of output that the property that is marked with the ManagementConfiguration attribute will return.
Docs.value: A 속성이 ManagementConfiguration 특성으로 표시 하는 출력의 유형을 나타내는 값을 반환 합니다.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 반환 된 형식이 <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=nameWithType>, 출력 형식의 값으로 처리 해야 하는 다음 <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=nameWithType>합니다.
